translation.ko: 경찰차 안에서 이걸 찾았어 완전 잔인하다

translation.en: She was so annoying.
I wanna throw up.
You and me both.
Where's Sonya?
Blown up. Crawlspace. Where are the cops?
translation.ko: 터트렸어, 마루 밑에서 경찰 시체는 어딨어?

translation.en: Ditched them with the car.
Now I gotta skip town again.
And that leaves you, and what to do with you.
translation.ko: 널 어떻게 해야 할지 결정해야 하는데

translation.en: -Any suggestions? -Are you gonna shoot me?
translation.ko: 좋은 생각 있니? 날 쏠 거야?

translation.en: No.
No. I was just shooting around you, 'cause I thought you'd put your hands up.
translation.ko: 아니, 주변만 쏘려고 했어 손을 올리고 있는 줄 알았거든

translation.en: I will burn your book!
Cole.
-Cole, listen to me. -No.
-Cole, listen to me. -No, Bee! You listen to me!
translation.ko: - 콜, 내 말 들어 - 싫어! 내 말을 들어!

translation.en: I've been hunted, you've stolen my blood, killed people,
translation.ko: 난 쫓겨 다녔고 누나는 내 피를 훔치고 사람을 죽였고

translation.en: shot at me, and just been general assholes all night.
translation.ko: 나에게 총까지 쏘고 그냥 아주 못된 계집이었어

translation.en: So, I wanna know what the hell's going on.
translation.ko: 도대체 뭐 때문에 이러는지 알고 싶다고

translation.en: Cole, you're too young to understand, okay? Just trust me.
translation.ko: 넌 이해하기에는 너무 어려 그냥 날 믿어

translation.en: Fuck you!
Cole.
No. You know what? You deserved that.
What, just because I'm 12 means I get to be treated like total shit
translation.ko: 고작 12살이니까 이런 더러운 대접을 받아도 싸다고?

translation.en: by you and Jeremy and everyone else?
You know what? You're Don Draper from Mad Men.
translation.ko: 그거 알아? 누나는 '매드맨' 주인공 돈 드레이퍼야

translation.en: How he's all cool and handsome and everybody loves him,
then he goes home and you find out he has a wife the whole time.
translation.ko: 사실은 아내를 놔두고 바람이나 피우는 놈이야

translation.en: -He's such a piece of shit! -Did you just ruin Mad Men for me?
It's not even on anymore. You'll live.
translation.ko: 더는 방영 안 해 화내지 마

translation.en: Still.
-What happens when you leave here? -What do you mean?
translation.ko: - 누나가 떠나면 어떻게 돼? - 무슨 말이야?

translation.en: -I will burn this! -Okay.
Cole... what do you want to know?
What's the blood for?
You mix the blood of the innocent with the blood of someone sacrificed,
translation.ko: 순결한 사람의 피와 희생자의 피를 섞고

translation.en: recite the verses,
while dripping it on the page.
And, basically, you get whatever you want.
I used to be so small... and so scared.
translation.ko: 난 너무 작았고 두려움에 떨곤 했지

translation.en: Now I'm strong... and I'm confident...
and that's all I ever wanted.
And, so, that's all I was to you.
You just used me to get what you wanted.
translation.ko: 누나가 원하는 걸 갖기 위해 날 이용한 거야?

translation.en: No.
No, Cole. I chose you.
I mean, I could've shot you and not Allison,
translation.ko: 난 앨리슨이 아닌 너를 쏠 수 있었어

translation.en: but I didn't. I chose you.
'Cause you're the best.
We click, right? You're my guy.
I'm not the first kid, am I?
translation.ko: 돌본 아이 중에 내가 처음은 아니지?

translation.en: No.
And you'll leave here and just find another faucet.
-You heard that? -I heard everything. This is my house.
translation.ko: 그 말을 들었어? 모든 걸 들었어 여긴 우리 집이니까

translation.en: Okay.
Okay, yes.
And tonight sucked, but we can start again.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤은 힘들었지만 우린 다시 시작할 수 있어

translation.en: So, you have a plan?
Yeah. We just say they attacked us.
translation.ko: 응, 저들이 우리를 공격했다고 하면 돼

translation.en: I got him.
Plus, dude, we would have so much fun.
Just you and me against the whole world.
No one will ever hurt you ever again.
translation.ko: 다시는 아무도 널 해치지 않을 거야

translation.en: There'll be nothing left to be afraid of. Isn't that what you wanted?
translation.ko: 걱정할 게 하나도 남지 않게 되지 네가 항상 원했던 게 그거 아니야?

translation.en: What do you say, Cole?
I guess...
I guess I have a plan, too.
No!
No!
No!
[boy] Pussy!
-When you're ready, you're ready. -A lot of things are scary.
translation.ko: - 자연스럽게 준비될 거야 - 두려운 게 많은 시기가 된 거야

translation.en: You gotta figure out what you want...
-and then do what you can to get it. -Keys...
translation.ko: 그리고 노력해서 원하는 걸 얻으면 돼 열쇠

translation.en: -Cole! -[engine revving]
Ten. Two.
Yeah!
What up, Cee?
You drove a car into your house.
I really didn't see that coming.
You never told me...
your intergalactic dream team.
You didn't ask.
I should have.
I'm usually pretty good at that stuff.
Admiral Adama to lead.
Data for his intelligence and cool head.
Predator to fight.
Then me and you.
You didn't say we could add ourselves.
translation.ko: 우리 자신도 넣을 수 있다고 하지 않았잖아

translation.en: It's science fiction. You can do anything.
translation.ko: 이건 공상 과학 소설이야 무엇이든 할 수 있어

translation.en: Well... I guess that's true.
But don't you get it yet?
I am the big bad.
I loved you.
I don't care about your dumb book or your stupid cult.
translation.ko: 누나의 바보 같은 책이나 멍청한 숭배의식은 신경 안 써

translation.en: I'm an adult...
because when I realized you were the big bad...
translation.ko: 왜냐면 누나는 악당이고 날 배신한 누나가

translation.en: and you betrayed me
and were just gonna hurt other kids,
translation.ko: 해치려 한다는 걸 알게 된 순간

translation.en: I drove a stolen car through you.
That, I'll give you. [chuckles]
I'll see you, Cee.
Goodbye.
-[Melanie's dad] Martinez. -Yeah?
Protect and serve, idiot.
-[Melanie] It's just a car. -Protect my car.
Just a car?! Just a car?!
Do not-- Put your hand down right now.
-I thought you were gonna drive away. -I couldn't leave you.
translation.ko: 난 네가 가버릴 줄 알았어 널 두고 갈 수 없었어

translation.en: That was such a douche car.
Melanie, get over here.
Get back here. Now.
Bye.
[Melanie's dad] Oh, my God.
Did you just put your face on him? Wanna go get tattoos now?
translation.ko: 저놈한테 뽀뽀한 거니? 이제 문신이라도 하러 가겠네

translation.en: Yo. What happened?
Dude, Cole stole a car.
Rammed his house. Killed, like, 50 people.
translation.ko: 자기 집을 들이박았대 50명 정도 죽었나 봐

translation.en: Fifty people. [scoffs]
[Jeremy] Hey, let's get out of here.
Today, y'all. Let's go.
Cindy.
-[Mom] Do you have my son? Please... -[Dad] Cole.
[Mom] Honey. Honey. Oh, my God.
Are you okay? Are you...?
-I'm okay. -[Dad] Are you all right?
-Oh, my God. What happened? -Is that blood?
Hey. What happened?
I don't need a babysitter anymore.
♪ Should've the known from the jump Yeah ♪
